natural solution: The cross product of any vector with itself is $\mathbf{0} = \boxed{\begin{pmatrix} 0 \\ 0 \\ 0 \end{pmatrix}}.$

 &= \mathbf{0} + \mathbf{v} \times \mathbf{w} - \mathbf{v} \times \mathbf{w} + \mathbf{0} \\ &= \mathbf{0}. \end{align}
